channel.title: Teaching on Chenhan Xu (许陈汉)
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Chenhan Xu (许陈汉)

item.description: Introduction Given the increasing advances of mobile and wearable technologies in people’s daily life, many biometrics and authentication techniques are being explored and developed (e.g., FaceID and TouchID). This course introduces students to the theory and practice of biometric (e.g., face and voice) authentication systems. The course will cover the fundamental principles of biometrics, including physiological and behavioral characteristics, and the algorithms and system architecture used to extract, represent, and match these characteristics.
